thread.title: UK music festivals guide 2015: everything you need to know about this summer's hottest events - 3am &
thread.title_full: UK music festivals guide 2015: everything you need to know about this summer's hottest events - 3am & Mirror Online

author: By Emma Munbodh
title: UK music festivals guide 2015: everything you need to know about this summer's hottest events - 3am &
text:
Where will you be you taking your wellies this summer? Bestival, Creamfields, Reading or Leeds?
Wherever you're going, stay tuned right here for all the gossip, line-up announcements and more as we start the summer 2015 festivals countdown.
Plus, save on all your camping essentials, including tents and waterproofs, in our festivals shopping guide .
Festival Playlister by Expedia
Wireless Festival 2015 This year marks Wireless Festival's tenth year and it is set to be its biggest yet, with an extra date added to the normally three day event.
Expect to see thousands flock to North London for one of the biggest city based festivals in the country.
Where: Finsbury Park, London
When: 28 June, 3-5 July 2015
Tickets: Wireless tickets via viagogo
Wireless tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: Drake, ASAP Rocky, Avicci, Kendrick Lemar, Nicki Minaj
Who's playing: Clean Bandit, David Guetta, Rita Ora, Labrinth, Mary J Blige, Jessie J, Jess Glynne, Katy B, Public Enemy, Chance the Rapper, Charlie XCX, Childish Gambino, Gorgon City, Wretch 32, Boy Better Know.
Camping event? No
Find out more about Wireless Festival
T in the Park Rex Katy B performs at T In The Park Festival on 12 Jul 2014
Now in it's 22nd year, 80,000 music lovers are set to descend on Strathclyde Country Park for Scotland’s biggest music festival this July.
Where: Strathallan Castle, Perthshire
When: 9-12 July 2015
Tickets: T in the Park tickets via Viagogo
T in the Park tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: Kasabian, The Libertines, The Prodigy, David Guetta, Sam Smith, Avicii, The Script, Stereophonics
Who's playing: Rudimental, Fatboy Slim, Hozier, Mark Ronson, Annie Mac, Hot Chip, The Wombats, Gorgon City, Duke Dumont, Jessie Ware, Fuse ODG, Jamie T, Paloma Faith, George Ezra and more.
Camping event? Yes
Find out more about T in the Park .
V Festival PA Emeli Sande performs at last year's V Festival
One of the year’s most popular events and always attracting big commercial names to two different sites over one weekend, Hylands Park in Chelmsford and Weston Park in South Staffordshire.
Where: Chelmsford, Weston-under-Lizard
When: 22-23 August 2015
Tickets: V Festival tickets
V Festival Tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: Calvin Harris, Stereophonics, The Script, Kasabian, Sam Smith, Olly Murs
Who's playing: Hoizer, Ellie Goulding, Paloma Faith, George Ezra, Clean Bandit, Labrinth, Courteeners, Nero Fuse ODG, Marina and the Diamonds and more.
Camping event? Yes
Find out more about V Festival.
Lovebox GETTY Since it's grass roots beginnings back in 2002, Lovebox has grown to become one of London's most exciting and affordable festivals.
With top international and home grown musical talent set to grace the multiple stages this year, Lovebox is the perfect place to soak up the summer festival atmosphere.
Where: Victoria Park, East London
When: 17-18 July 2015
Tickets: Tickets via viagogo
Tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: Rudimental, Snoop Dogg, Hot Chip, Jessie Ware, Mark Ronson
Who's playing: Cypress Hill, Annie Mac, Ella Eyre, Skepta, Little Dragon, MK, Action Bronson, Gilles Peterson, Groove Armada
Camping event? No
Find out more about Lovebox Festival
iTunes Festival Rex Starting out in 2007, the iTunes Festival has grown into a popular summer event hosted at the stunning Roundhouse in Camden, North London.
The free music festival is sponsored by Apple, giving iTunes users the chance to win tickets for each concert.
Where: London
When: 1- 30 September 2015
Tickets: FREE
Headline acts: TBC - all should be revealed later this summer.
Who's playing: TBC
Camping event? No
Reading and Leeds Getty Mumford & Sons and Bastille are on this year's huge line-up
The oldest popular music festival in the world famous for its alternative, indie, punk and metal headliners which have ranged from Metallica to Eminem over the years.
Where: Reading, Leeds
When: 28-30 August 2015
Tickets: Reading and Leeds Festival tickets via Viagogo
Reading and Leeds Festival tickets via Viagogo
Headline acts: Mumford & Sons, Metallica, The Libertines, DEADMAU5, Bastille and more.
Who's playing: All Time Low, Panic! At the Disco, Neck Deep, Bring me the Horizon, Royal Blood, Pierce the Veil, Marmozets, Jamie T, The Maccabees, The Cribs, Gorgon City, Limp Bizkit and more.
Camping event? Yes
Somerset House Summer Series Where: London
When: 9 -19 July 2015
Tickets: Tickets via viagogo
Tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: Jessie J, James Bey, Belle and Sebastian
Who's playing: Kwabs, George Ezra, Chronixx, Passenger, Chromeo, Gary Clark Jr
Camping event? No
Edinburgh Military Tattoo PA Ultimate family day out: This year's show features Switzerland's Top Secret Drums and more
Running alongside the Edinburgh Festival, which showcases the latest cultural talent in comedy and theatre, the Edinburgh Tattoo is a more traditional display of military might set in the stunning surroundings of the esplanade of Edinburgh Castle.
Where: Edinburgh
When: 7-29 August 2015
Tickets: Edinburgh Military Tattoo tickets via Viagogo
Headline acts: Switzerland's Top Secret Drum Corps and more TBC
Who's playing: Switzerland's Top Secret Drum Corps
Camping event? No
Bestival
Bestival is the Isle of Wight's multi-award winning festival, and is famous for it's huge line up which has included Basement Jaxx, The Chemical Brothers, Primal Scream and more.
Where: Robin Hill Country Park, Isle of Wight
When: 10-13 September 2015
Tickets: Bestival Tickets via Viagogo
Bestival Tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: The Chemical Brothers, Underworld, Duran Duran, Gorgon City
Who's playing: Tame Impala, The Jacksons, Jungle, Jurassic 5, Flying Lotus, Jamie XX, Level 42 and more.
Camping event? Yes
Creamfields Fans crowd around the stage at Creamfields 2014
The ultimate bank holiday party! Cheshire's Creamfields festival is annually held on the last bank holiday of the summer and jam-packed with drum and bass, house and dance acts.
Where: Daresbury, Cheshire
When: 28-30 August 2015
Tickets: Creamfield Tickets via Viagogo
Creamfield Tickets via Ticketmaster
Headline acts: Avicii, Armin Van Buuren, The Chemical Brothers, Steve Angello, Above and Beyond and more.
Who's playing: Annie Mac, Martin Garrix, Arty, Albin Myers, Alesso, Laidback Luke, Tommy Trash, AN21, Third Party and more.
Camping event? Yes
Find out more about Creamfields Festival.
Festival Number 6
Set in the beautiful pastures of Portmeirion, this unique music and arts festival features top dance floor legends alongside cutting edge new talent.
Where: Portmeirion, Wales
When : 3-6 September 2015
Tickets: Tickets via Ticketmaster
Who's playing : Grace Jones, Belle and Sebastian, James Bey, Young Fathers, Kate Tempest, Rae Morris, Shura, Stornoway, The Bohicas, Fryars, The 2 Bears, Bicep, Motor City Drum Ensemble and more.
Camping event? Yes
Find out more about Festival Number 6
Sundown Festival
The music at Sundown has a big urban influence and the dance music line up favours heavyweights from the beats and breaks genre.
Although relatively small the festival does attract top names and offers a nice end to the summer.
Where: Norfolk Showground, Norwich
When : 4-6 September 2015
Tickets: Tickets via viagogo
Tickets via Ticketzone
Who's playing : Rudimental, Tinie Tempah, Labrinth, Ella Henderson, Wretch 32, MNEK, Hannah Wants, Gorgon City, Fuse ODG, Maverick Sabre, Raleigh Ritchie and many more
Camping event? Yes
Find out more about Sundown Festival
Somersault Festival
Created by the team behind the award-winning Wilderness Festival, Somersault delivers a true summer holiday experience.
With a programme packed with music, outdoor activities like yoga and trekking and alternative circus and street theatre performances there is pretty much something for everyone.
Where: Castle Hill, North Devon
When : 23-27 July 2015
Tickets: Tickets via viagogo
Tickets via Ticketzone
Who's playing: Bombay Bicycle Club, Crystal Fighters, Jimmy Cliff, Laura Marling, Passenger and more
Camping event? Yes
Find out more about Somersault Festival
Glasgow Summer sessions WireImage Paolo Nutini
Where: Bellahouston Park
When : 29-30 August 2015
Tickets: Tickets via Ticketmaster
Tickets via viagogo
Who's playing: Calvin Harris, Ellie Goulding, Paolo Nutini, Grace Jones, John Newman, Disciples, Burns
Camping event? No
Citadel Getty Jack Steadman of Bombay Bicycle Club
Where: Victoria Park, London
When : 19 July 2015
Tickets: Tickets via Ticketmaster
Tickets via viagogo
Who's playing: Bombay Bicycle Club, Ben Howard, Anna Calvi, Neneh Cherry and more
Camping event? No
